name: Screen Split
description:
A small geometric rhythm game about shapes and... LASERS!

How to play:

press SPACE to jump, use A, D or arrow keys to teleport between the two sides of the screen and dodge lasers

This game is made for GeoJam 2022.

Theme: Pick a side

Music and "art" are all made by myself. 

Headphones are reccomended for better experience.
